alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 3:06AM EDT until March 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...CRITICALLY LOW HUMIDITY WITH GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH ERC WILL RESULT IN ELEVATED FIRE DANGER TODAY... .Breezy southeast winds and low fuel moisture will create Red Flag conditions for a few hours this afternoon as relative humidity values drop below 35 percent. The lowest humidity values are expected to be away from the immediate coast. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HIGH ERC VALUES... The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Area - Ruskin FL has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Polk...Hardee...Highlands...DeSoto...Inland Citrus...Inland Hernando...Inland Pasco...Inland Hillsborough...Inland Manatee...Inland Sarasota...Inland Charlotte...Inland Lee. * WIND...Southeast winds 15 to 20 MPH with gusts to around 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...30 to 35 percent. * ERC...28 to 47. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Polk
